original_text: Now you must get up. Stand on your feet. I have chosen you to be my servant. That is why I have appeared to you today. You must tell other people about what you have seen. After that, I will show you other things that you must tell people.
korean_text: 일어나 너의 발로 서라 내가 네게 나타난 것은 곧 네가 나를 본 일과 장차 내가 네게 나타날 일에 너로 종과 증인을 삼으려 함이니

sentences.original_text: I have chosen you to be my servant.
That is why I have appeared to you today.
You must tell other people about what you have seen.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 본 것을 다른 사람들에게 말해야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: After that, I will show you other things.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에, 내가 당신에게 다른 것들을 보여주겠습니다.
